constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 39 (Thursday, March 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COLE:
H.R. 6919.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H1303]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Prohibition on Imports of Russian Oil Act
